<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Restricted">[Red Mantis Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=17)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 71 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

You are a Red Mantis assassin, inducted by the mantis god and sworn to chase your prey to the end of the world and beyond.

name: Red Mantis Assassin
prerequisite: trained in sawtooth sabers; worshipper of Achaekek; lawful evil alignment; member of the Red Mantis assassins

search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 71 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
trained in [sawtooth sabers](/Weapons.aspx?ID=65); worshipper of [Achaekek](/Deities.aspx?ID=29); lawful evil alignment; member of the Red Mantis assassins

**Access**
You are from Mediogalti Island.

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You are a Red Mantis assassin, inducted by the mantis god and sworn to chase your prey to the end of the world and beyond.
</summary>
